ModMetaData.name: Professor Rosen's Backstories
ModMetaData.author: Professor Rosen
ModMetaData.description:
Intially a small mod to become familiar with RimWorld, this has now ballooned into over 100 backstories, with more added when the fancy strikes me. It's become something of a micro-fiction collection. Check the README for more details.
GNU Terry Pratchett.
